# Docs for the Azure Web Apps Deploy action: https://github.com/Azure/webapps-deploy
# More GitHub Actions for Azure: https://github.com/Azure/actions

name: Build and deploy ASP.Net Core app to Azure Web App - ferreprincipal

#UNCOMMENT THIS

# on:
#   push:
#     branches:
#       - artifact-test
#   workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: 'staging-2' # CAMBIAR
      url: ${{ steps.deploy-to-webapp.outputs.webapp-url }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Set up .NET Core
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v1
        with:
          dotnet-version: '6.0.x'
          include-prerelease: true

      - name: Build with dotnet
        run: dotnet build --configuration Release

      - name: dotnet publish
        run: dotnet publish Presentation/Nop.Web/Nop.Web.csproj -c Release -o ${{env.DOTNET_ROOT}}/myapp

#OJO AQUI
      - name: Deploy to Azure Web App
        id: deploy-to-webapp
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
        with:
          # CAMBIAR 
          app-name: 'ferreprincipal'
          # CAMBIAR 
          slot-name: 'staging-2'
          #CAMBIAR 
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZUREAPPSERVICE_PUBLISHPROFILE_AD14C9A239CE421B8F23E3FB1C9950E8 }}

          package: ${{env.DOTNET_ROOT}}/myapp
